content: As soon as you pass through the archway, the next boss battle will begin and you'll discover who was responsible for the voices you heard earlier.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Furnace_Valley_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Furnace Valley Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Valley Entrance' and the sub-subsection 'Yaoguai Chief - Flint Chief'.
The content is as follows:
As soon as you pass through the archway, the next boss battle will begin and you'll discover who was responsible for the voices you heard earlier.
